entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
